## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse] object to specify whether your app is able to pause a workout. The response object contains only the status code that indicates whether to launch your app or whether there was a problem.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] methods of your pause workout handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling].

# INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse

**Class**

Your app’s response to a pause workout intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse] object to specify whether your app is able to pause a workout. The response object contains only the status code that indicates whether to launch your app or whether there was a problem.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] methods of your pause workout handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Getting the Response Code

- **code**: The code that indicates whether you successfully handled the intent.
- **INPauseWorkoutIntentResponseCode**: Constants that indicate the response state.

## Pause a Workout

- **INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling**: An interface that handles requests to pause a workout.
- **INPauseWorkoutIntent**: A request to pause the current workout that also stops the gathering of workout data.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
